author: Jack_Sassy
title: Best set of every year since release.
review:
This set has it all — box, instructions, and most of all — pieces, yes, pieces!

 

Building this set was a whole new experience and most likely the hardest set I've ever built, it's magnificent in its final form and worth your money. Sadly you can't find it in stores so that's not good. Anyway, it includes 3 pieces and no minifigures :(, BUT you can cut out the football player from the polybag front and there you go, if you're lacking a ball, then don't worry, cause that's included on the polybag to be cut out too!

 

Overall, this set includes many opportunities, and I'm surprised that there are no alternate builds suggested. It is worth every cent, so worth, that I'm going to my store now to get a refund.
